title: Coulomb friction parameters not handled properly in dart

content.raw:
There are a bunch of sliding boxes with difference coefficients of friction in [test_friction.world](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/9410f80cf7a70accd8cde7617b2800872283849f/sdf/worlds/test_friction.world?at=default). In ODE and bullet, two of the boxes remain still while the other boxes start to slide at different rates (according to their friction coefficient). In dart, however, all the boxes slide at the same rate.
This could be a simple matter of parameters not being passed on correctly.

(Similar to #989 for simbody)

@jlee02 @karenliu
content.html:
There are a bunch of sliding boxes with difference coefficients of friction in test_friction.world. In ODE and bullet, two of the boxes remain still while the other boxes start to slide at different rates (according to their friction coefficient). In dart, however, all the boxes slide at the same rate. This could be a simple matter of parameters not being passed on correctly.

(Similar to #989 for simbody)

@jlee02 @karenliu
